summary: An FBI forensic accountant emails colleagues about discovering a UMB Bank account number for 'ELLMAX' (likely Ghislaine Maxwell) while reviewing UBS emails, and attaches a related document. The email aims to link this account number to Maxwell's known accounts at UMB Bank.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The sender of the email who discovered a UMB Bank account number for 'ELLMAX' while reviewing UBS emails and is sharing this information to link it to Ghislaine Maxwell's accounts.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to in the email subject and body; the 'ELLMAX' account number is believed to be linked to her accounts at UMB Bank.

connections.person1: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
connections.description: The FBI forensic accountant is investigating Ghislaine Maxwell's financial accounts, specifically tracing a UMB Bank account number linked to her.

events.title: Discovery of Maxwell's UMB Account Number
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant emails colleagues about discovering a UMB Bank account number for 'ELLMAX' (linked to Ghislaine Maxwell) while reviewing UBS emails.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: An FBI forensic accountant discovered a UMB Bank account number for 'ELLMAX' while reviewing UBS emails.
The account number is believed to be linked to Ghislaine Maxwell's accounts at UMB Bank.
The discovery was communicated via email on June 15, 2020, with an attached document for reference.
The email originated from the FBI New York Field Office, indicating an active financial investigation into Maxwell.
The attachment 'UBSTERRAMAR00000205.pdf' likely contains detailed financial records or evidence related to the account.
